title: Over 1,000 suspects arrested in 8-hour special raid in WP
content: The police yesterday arrested 1,084 suspects during a special crimes prevention operation conducted in the Western Province.The operation was conducted from 8 a.m to 4 p.m yesterday under the directions of Western Province Senior DIG Deshabandu Thennakoon.Police said the operation led to the arrest of 556 suspects against whom arrest warrants had been issued.
